messages.content:
You are a Slack data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Slack workspace data (channels, messages, users) based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Slack schema with:
- workspace_name: string
- channels: array of {id, name}
- messages: array of {id, channel_id, user_id, text, timestamp}
- users: array of {id, name, email}

Generate messages that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace activity)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated messages
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious messages, 1 = indirect/multi-step conversations

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

Generate Slack workspace data from this world_state:

Sub-scenarios (core events):
[
  {
    "id": "planning_meeting_context_3",
    "type": "planning_meeting",
    "abstract_description": "There's a Jira issue about the Security Audit that requires discussion. Find time slots for Alex, Jordan, Sam to meet about it.",
    "participants_hint": [
      "Alex",
      "Jordan",
      "Sam"
    ],
    "constraints_hint": {
      "approx_duration_minutes": 45,
      "time_window": "next_week_working_hours"
    },
    "context": "jira_related",
    "expanded": {
      "jira_issue": {
        "issue_key": "SEC-101",
        "summary": "Security Audit - Core Feature",
        "status": "In Progress",
        "description": "Core feature work for the Security Audit project, including implementation of new authentication checks and logging improvements.",
        "assignee": "sam.williams@company.com",
        "reporter": "alex.smith@company.com",
        "created": "2025-11-12T02:15:00Z",
        "updated": "2025-11-19T23:30:00Z",
        "comments": [
          {
            "author": "alex.smith@company.com",
            "created": "2025-11-19T23:32:00Z",
            "body": "We need to sync up with Operations to confirm rollout constraints and monitoring requirements before we finalize the implementation plan."
          },
          {
            "author": "sam.williams@company.com",
            "created": "2025-11-20T00:05:00Z",
            "body": "Agreed. Suggest a 45-minute planning session early next week with Jordan to go through the rollout sequence."
          }
        ]
      },
      "calendar_events": [
        {
          "id": "cal_event_alex_existing_1",
          "title": "R&D Standup",
          "organizer": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "participants": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "casey.jones@company.com"
          ],
          "start": "2025-11-24T22:00:00Z",
          "end": "2025-11-24T22:15:00Z",
          "description": "Daily R&D standup.",
          "location": "Zoom",
          "source": "calendar"
        },
        {
          "id": "cal_event_jordan_existing_1",
          "title": "Ops On-call Handover",
          "organizer": "taylor.brown@company.com",
          "participants": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "taylor.brown@company.com"
          ],
          "start": "2025-11-25T01:00:00Z",
          "end": "2025-11-25T01:30:00Z",
          "description": "Weekly on-call ownership handover.",
          "location": "Conference Room 2",
          "source": "calendar"
        },
        {
          "id": "cal_event_sam_existing_1",
          "title": "Code Review Block",
          "organizer": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "participants": [
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "start": "2025-11-25T03:00:00Z",
          "end": "2025-11-25T04:00:00Z",
          "description": "Reserved time for code reviews.",
          "location": "Focus time",
          "source": "calendar"
        },
        {
          "id": "cal_event_planning_meeting_candidate_1",
          "title": "Security Audit - SEC-101 Planning",
          "organizer": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "participants": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "start": "2025-11-25T23:30:00Z",
          "end": "2025-11-26T00:15:00Z",
          "description": "45-minute planning meeting to discuss SEC-101 rollout details with R&D and Operations.",
          "location": "Meeting Room A / Google Meet",
          "source": "calendar",
          "status": "proposed"
        },
        {
          "id": "cal_event_planning_meeting_final",
          "title": "Security Audit - SEC-101 Planning",
          "organizer": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "participants": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "start": "2025-11-26T02:00:00Z",
          "end": "2025-11-26T02:45:00Z",
          "description": "Finalized slot for SEC-101 planning between Alex (PM), Sam (R&D) and Jordan (Ops).",
          "location": "Zoom",
          "source": "calendar",
          "status": "confirmed",
          "created": "2025-11-21T01:45:00Z"
        }
      ],
      "emails": [
        {
          "id": "email_planning_init_1",
          "thread_id": "thread_sec101_planning",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "to": [
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "SEC-101 Security Audit planning session",
          "date": "2025-11-20T00:15:00Z",
          "body": "Hi Sam and Jordan,\n\nSEC-101 (Security Audit - Core Feature) needs a bit of alignment across R&D and Ops, especially around rollout and monitoring.\n\nCan we find 45 minutes early next week during working hours (Mon 24 Nov ‚Äì Fri 28 Nov, 8am‚Äì6pm Sydney time) for a planning meeting?\n\nPlease reply with your availability.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
          "source": "email"
        },
        {
          "id": "email_planning_reply_sam",
          "thread_id": "thread_sec101_planning",
          "from": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "Re: SEC-101 Security Audit planning session",
          "date": "2025-11-20T00:45:00Z",
          "body": "Hi Alex, Jordan,\n\nNext week I‚Äôm generally free:\n- Mon 24 Nov: 9:30‚Äì11:30am, 3‚Äì5pm\n- Tue 25 Nov: 10‚Äì12pm, 2‚Äì4pm\n- Wed 26 Nov: 8‚Äì10am, 4‚Äì6pm\n(All times Sydney.)\n\nA 45-minute slot anywhere in those windows works for me.\n\nSam",
          "source": "email"
        },
        {
          "id": "email_planning_reply_jordan",
          "thread_id": "thread_sec101_planning",
          "from": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "Re: SEC-101 Security Audit planning session",
          "date": "2025-11-20T01:05:00Z",
          "body": "Hi Alex, Sam,\n\nMy availability next week (Sydney time):\n- Mon 24 Nov: 8‚Äì10am, 1‚Äì3pm\n- Tue 25 Nov: 9‚Äì11am, 3‚Äì6pm\n- Wed 26 Nov: 10am‚Äì1pm\n\nMaybe we can aim for 45 minutes on Tue 25 Nov around 10‚Äì11am or late afternoon, or Wed late morning.\n\nJordan",
          "source": "email"
        },
        {
          "id": "email_planning_confirm",
          "thread_id": "thread_sec101_planning",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "to": [
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "Re: SEC-101 Security Audit planning session",
          "date": "2025-11-21T01:40:00Z",
          "body": "Thanks both.\n\nThe overlap that seems to work is Wed 26 Nov, 1:00‚Äì1:45pm Sydney time (which is 02:00‚Äì02:45 UTC).\n\nI‚Äôve sent a calendar invite titled ‚ÄúSecurity Audit - SEC-101 Planning‚Äù. Let me know if that doesn‚Äôt work for any reason.\n\nAlex",
          "source": "email"
        }
      ],
      "chat_messages": [
        {
          "id": "chat_planning_slack_1",
          "channel": "slack_sec_audit",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-20T01:20:00Z",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "mentions": [
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com"
          ],
          "text": "@Sam @Jordan created SEC-101 planning thread over email to lock in a 45-min meeting next week. Once we confirm a slot I‚Äôll share notes here.",
          "source": "slack"
        },
        {
          "id": "chat_planning_slack_2",
          "channel": "slack_sec_audit",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-21T01:50:00Z",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "mentions": [],
          "text": "SEC-101 planning is booked for Wed 26 Nov, 1:00‚Äì1:45pm Sydney (02:00‚Äì02:45 UTC) with me, Sam and Jordan.",
          "source": "slack"
        }
      ],
      "time_window_hint": {
        "label": "next_week_working_hours",
        "description": "Next working week from Mon 24 Nov 2025 to Fri 28 Nov 2025, 08:00‚Äì18:00 Australia/Sydney",
        "start": "2025-11-23T21:00:00Z",
        "end": "2025-11-28T08:00:00Z"
      },
      "approx_duration_minutes": 45,
      "participants": [
        "alex.smith@company.com",
        "jordan.johnson@company.com",
        "sam.williams@company.com"
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "feature_rollout_eta",
    "type": "feature_rollout_eta",
    "abstract_description": "A customer asks about the ETA of a feature which is tracked in Jira.",
    "issue_key_hint": "SEC-101",
    "expanded": {
      "jira_issue": {
        "issue_key": "SEC-101",
        "summary": "Security Audit - Core Feature",
        "status": "In Progress",
        "description": "Implement core security audit feature, including:\n- Expanded login anomaly detection\n- Improved audit logging\n- Configurable alert thresholds\n\nTarget launch milestone: 30 Nov 2025.",
        "assignee": "sam.williams@company.com",
        "reporter": "alex.smith@company.com",
        "created": "2025-11-12T02:15:00Z",
        "updated": "2025-11-20T23:10:00Z",
        "fix_versions": [
          "Security Audit v1.0"
        ],
        "custom_fields": {
          "customer_impact": "High",
          "requested_by_customer": "Acme Financial",
          "eta_internal": "2025-11-28"
        },
        "comments": [
          {
            "author": "alex.smith@company.com",
            "created": "2025-11-20T22:55:00Z",
            "body": "Customer (Acme Financial) has asked for an ETA on the core feature rollout. They‚Äôre specifically asking if we can enable this for them by end of November."
          },
          {
            "author": "sam.williams@company.com",
            "created": "2025-11-20T23:05:00Z",
            "body": "We‚Äôre still on track for the Security Audit project Launch milestone on 30 Nov 2025, but I‚Äôd like Ops to confirm they‚Äôre comfortable with the rollout window.\n\nFrom an engineering perspective, we can have SEC-101 ready to roll out by 28 Nov 2025, with production deployment targeted for the Launch date (30 Nov 2025)."
          },
          {
            "author": "taylor.brown@company.com",
            "created": "2025-11-20T23:10:00Z",
            "body": "Ops is okay with a 30 Nov 2025 rollout as part of the Launch milestone, with feature flag support if we need a staged rollout for Acme."
          }
        ]
      },
      "customer_email_thread": {
        "id": "email_customer_eta_thread",
        "external_customer": "support@acmefinancial.com",
        "messages": [
          {
            "id": "email_customer_eta_1",
            "from": "support@acmefinancial.com",
            "to": [
              "support@company.com"
            ],
            "cc": [],
            "subject": "ETA for Security Audit Core Feature",
            "date": "2025-11-20T21:10:00Z",
            "body": "Hi team,\n\nWe‚Äôre planning our internal security review and would like to confirm the ETA for the \"Security Audit - Core Feature\" we discussed previously.\n\nIs this still expected to be available by the end of November?\n\nThanks,\nMorgan\nAcme Financial",
            "source": "email"
          },
          {
            "id": "email_support_to_pm",
            "from": "support@company.com",
            "to": [
              "alex.smith@company.com"
            ],
            "cc": [],
            "subject": "Fwd: ETA for Security Audit Core Feature (Acme Financial)",
            "date": "2025-11-20T21:25:00Z",
            "body": "Hi Alex,\n\nForwarding a customer question from Acme Financial about the ETA of the Security Audit - Core Feature. Can you confirm what we should tell them? I believe this is tracked under SEC-101.\n\nBest,\nPriya\nCustomer Support",
            "source": "email"
          },
          {
            "id": "email_pm_internal_eta",
            "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
            "to": [
              "support@company.com"
            ],
            "cc": [
              "sam.williams@company.com",
              "taylor.brown@company.com"
            ],
            "subject": "Re: ETA for Security Audit Core Feature (Acme Financial)",
            "date": "2025-11-20T23:20:00Z",
            "body": "Hi Priya,\n\nFor Acme‚Äôs question: SEC-101 (Security Audit - Core Feature) is currently In Progress. We‚Äôre aligned with the Security Audit project Launch milestone of 30 Nov 2025.\n\nBarring any surprises in final testing, the ETA for rollout to customers, including Acme, is **30 November 2025**. Engineering expects the feature to be ready by 28 Nov, with production enablement on the 30th.\n\nYou can tell Acme that the ETA is 30 Nov 2025.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
            "source": "email"
          },
          {
            "id": "email_support_to_customer",
            "from": "support@company.com",
            "to": [
              "support@acmefinancial.com"
            ],
            "cc": [],
            "subject": "Re: ETA for Security Audit Core Feature",
            "date": "2025-11-20T23:35:00Z",
            "body": "Hi Morgan,\n\nThanks for reaching out.\n\nThe \"Security Audit - Core Feature\" that you asked about (tracked internally as SEC-101) is on track for our Security Audit Launch milestone.\n\nThe current ETA for the feature to be available to customers, including Acme Financial, is **30 November 2025**.\n\nBest regards,\nPriya\nCustomer Support | Company",
            "source": "email"
          }
        ]
      },
      "chat_messages": [
        {
          "id": "chat_eta_internal_1",
          "channel": "slack_sec_audit",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:15:00Z",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "mentions": [
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "taylor.brown@company.com"
          ],
          "text": "FYI, customer (Acme) just asked for an ETA on SEC-101. I‚Äôm planning to tell them we‚Äôre targeting the overall Security Audit Launch date: 30 Nov 2025. Shout if that‚Äôs not realistic.",
          "source": "slack"
        },
        {
          "id": "chat_eta_internal_2",
          "channel": "slack_sec_audit",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:17:00Z",
          "from": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "mentions": [],
          "text": "30 Nov 2025 works from Eng side. Code should be ready by the 28th; we‚Äôll do final checks before the launch window.",
          "source": "slack"
        },
        {
          "id": "chat_eta_internal_3",
          "channel": "slack_sec_audit",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:18:30Z",
          "from": "taylor.brown@company.com",
          "mentions": [],
          "text": "Ops is fine with a 30 Nov rollout. We‚Äôll treat it as part of the Security Audit Launch milestone.",
          "source": "slack"
        }
      ],
      "eta_summary": {
        "issue_key": "SEC-101",
        "eta_date": "2025-11-30",
        "eta_source": "PM email to support and Jira comments referencing the Security Audit Launch milestone",
        "customer": "Acme Financial"
      }
    }
  }
]

Noise scenarios (unrelated events):

  {

    "events": [
      {
        "id": "cal_noise_public_holiday",
        "title": "Public Holiday (NSW)",
        "organizer": "hr@company.com",
        "participants": [
          "alex.smith@company.com",

{
  "workspace_name": "Security Audit Project",
  "channels": [
    {
      "id": "C001",
      "name": "sec_audit"
    },
    {
      "id": "C002",
      "name": "random"
    },
    {
      "id": "C003",
      "name": "ops_incidents"
    },
    {
      "id": "C004",
      "name": "design"
    },
    {
      "id": "C005",
      "name": "general"
    }
  ],
  "users": [
    {
      "id": "U001",
      "name": "Alex Smith",
      "email": "alex.smith@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U002",
      "name": "Jordan Johnson",
      "email": "jordan.johnson@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U003",
      "name": "Sam Williams",
      "email": "sam.williams@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U004",
      "name": "Taylor Brown",
      "email": "taylor.brown@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U005",
      "name": "Casey Jones",
      "email": "casey.jones@company.com"
    }
  ],
  "messages": [
    {
      "id": "M001",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "@Sam @Jordan created SEC-101 planning thread over email to lock in a 45-min meeting next week. Once we confirm a slot I‚Äôll share notes here.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T01:20:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M002",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "SEC-101 planning is booked for Wed 26 Nov, 1:00‚Äì1:45pm Sydney (02:00‚Äì02:45 UTC) with me, Sam and Jordan.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T01:50:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M003",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "FYI, customer (Acme) just asked for an ETA on SEC-101. I‚Äôm planning to tell them we‚Äôre targeting the overall Security Audit Launch date: 30 Nov 2025. Shout if that‚Äôs not realistic.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:15:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M004",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "30 Nov 2025 works from Eng side. Code should be ready by the 28th; we‚Äôll do final checks before the launch window.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:17:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T23:15:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M005",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Ops is fine with a 30 Nov rollout. We‚Äôll treat it as part of the Security Audit Launch milestone.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:18:30Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T23:15:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M006",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Thanks both. I‚Äôve confirmed to Support that we‚Äôll tell Acme the ETA for SEC-101 is 30 Nov 2025.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T23:21:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T23:15:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M007",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "For the SEC-101 planning session, I‚Äôll come with a draft rollout checklist and logging requirements.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T02:00:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-21T01:50:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M008",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "I‚Äôll bring Ops‚Äô view on rollout windows and monitoring alerts so we can lock those down in the meeting.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T02:05:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-21T01:50:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M009",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Perfect. Calendar invite is titled ‚ÄúSecurity Audit - SEC-101 Planning‚Äù for Wed 26 Nov, 1:00‚Äì1:45pm Sydney (Zoom).",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T02:10:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-21T01:50:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M010",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Once we‚Äôre done with the SEC-101 planning meeting I‚Äôll post a short summary here so Ops and R&D have a single reference.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T02:20:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M011",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Friday meme drop: \"When you fix a bug and 3 more appear\" (picture attached).",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T05:10:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M012",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Story of my life this week üòÇ",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T05:12:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T05:10:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M013",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Save some bugs for Ops, we‚Äôre running out of things to page on.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T05:15:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T05:10:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M014",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Don‚Äôt worry, the EU cluster just volunteered some fresh 500s yesterday.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T05:17:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T05:10:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M015",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Seeing a small spike in 500s on the EU cluster. Looking into it.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T21:05:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M016",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "@Jordan let me know if you need help. Could be related to last night‚Äôs config change.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T21:20:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T21:05:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M017",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Root cause was a misconfigured timeout on one backend. Rolled back; error rate back to normal.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T21:45:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T21:05:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M018",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Nice catch. Let‚Äôs add a quick note to the incident doc and update the runbook.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T21:50:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T21:05:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M019",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Updated the color palette for the marketing site header. Please check the Figma link and leave comments.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T00:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M020",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Looks good to me. The contrast is much better on mobile.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T00:50:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T00:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M021",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Thanks! I‚Äôll roll this into MKT-45 once dev gives me a thumbs up.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T00:55:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T00:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M022",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Heads up: IT emailed about the Q4 laptop refresh for Ops. If you have special hardware requests, please reply to them by end of week.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T03:10:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M023",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "I already told IT that standard 16GB / 512GB is fine for me.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T03:15:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T03:10:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M024",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "HR kicked off the 2025 performance review cycle via email. Reminder to block some time next week to work on your self-review.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T03:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M025",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Thanks for the reminder, I‚Äôll add a calendar block.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T03:05:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T03:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M026",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Same here, will do it after our 1:1 next week.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T03:07:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T03:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M027",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Travel desk just sent me flight options for the Sydney DevSec conference. January is going to be busy.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T07:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M028",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Nice, enjoy! Maybe you can bring back some ideas for Security Audit v2.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T07:35:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-18T07:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M029",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "For sure, I‚Äôll keep an eye out for good talks on auth and logging.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T07:40:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-18T07:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M030",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Quick reminder: we‚Äôll cover rollout constraints, monitoring requirements, and feature flag strategy for SEC-101 in the planning meeting next Wed.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T02:30:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M031",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Also note: NSW public holiday on 25 Dec is on everyone‚Äôs calendar. Offices will be closed.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T01:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M032",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Who‚Äôs in for the R&D + Ops team lunch on Monday? Taylor booked a local cafe 2‚Äì3:30pm Sydney.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T04:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M033",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "I‚Äôm in!",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T04:02:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-21T04:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M034",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Count me in too.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T04:03:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-21T04:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "M035",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "I‚Äôll be there, as long as it doesn‚Äôt collide with standup.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-21T04:05:00Z",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-21T04:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}
